ritual.text.configuration: You shall have the following configuration:
ritual.samas.tablet.text:
Group 1.1
Purifying the Patient in front of Samas.

With a Leather Waterskin you grab a
hold of pure water from a nearby
river.

Perform the ritual at night.

In a 3 meters long table, place down
food offerings to Samas.

In front of it, put down ceramic altars
with the sides having honey flasks and
the middle the item you shall dispose
witchcraft onto.

Place the four figurines of the
witch/warlock who has attacked you.
Burn it down.

Recite the incantation from this tablet,
after the ritual is over, dispose of the
infused item.
ritual.pazuzu.tablet.text:
Group AG.1
Blessing before Pazuzu.

Perform the ritual at night.

Wear Pazuzu's Amulet, with His imagery.

In a 3 meter-long table, place down a
clay figurine of Him in the center.

In front of it, put down three evenly
spaced ceramic altars with the offering
on the sides having rotten or
poisonous famished food and
the center having an object of value.

Recite this tablet's incantation upon
the object of value, then you will have
his Blessing for the night until dawn.
ritual.udug.tablet.text:
Group B6.1
Udug before Pazuzu.

This is an advanced witchcraft ritual
made for a witch who has gained the
Blessing of Pazuzu, from group AG.

For the preparation of the ritual, kill
an animal with Gebel's knife and
bottle his bile from the liver.
You must have two bottles.

In ritual, at night, stand in front of a
3-meter long table with the
Bile Bottles at the sides.

Fill the surroudings of the ritual with
a Zissuru flour circle, protecting yourself from danger.

To assure control, wear a regular
Pazuzu's Amulet at all times.

Recite the tablet's incantation upon
Pazuzu's clay figure, placed in the center.

The Udug will last until dawn, for your
power grows weak and his figure weakens
as well. The user of witchcraft shall borrow the
Udug's poisonous fangs and he shall
follow him everywhere he goes.
ritual.imhullu.tablet.text:
Group 2.2
Imhullu before Marduk through Samas.

This is for warriors who are adept at the skill of air flow for a weapon to aid them in battle.

For this ritual, you will need multiple personal treasures made from precious gems.

In ritual, at night, stand before the Marduk's star and put down Samas' figure, for it will serve you as a medium to reach Marduk.

Behind it, put down a 3-meter long table, on each side you will put the treasure and in the middle you shall put two hand fans made from sheep wool.

On each side of the figure, put down Mirsu, for it will serve as libation.

You have the following configuration:

You have now a weapon blessed with powers simillar to the legendary Imhullu, it makes enemies fly high up into the air.
ritual.sharur.tablet.text:
Group 2.1
Sharur before Ninurta through Samas.

This is a ritual for warriors and travellers to aid their journey.

For this ritual, you will need multiple personal treasures made from precious gems.

In ritual, in daylight, stand in front of a 3-meter long table with the chosen libation at each side.

At the table's center, put down the targeted Mace you want to enchantt to Sharur's glory.

In front of the table, place down Samas' figure at the center and Mirsu as a sweet offering at each side. 

You have the following configuration:

Recite the tablet's incantation upon Samas's clay figure.

Through Samas, you have enchanted your weapon to carry a power similar to Sharur, which will grant you the ability to fly long distances with it.
ritual.anzu.tablet.text:
Group AG.3
Anzu before Lamashtu with Pazuzu Protection.

This is an advanced ritual, for those adept in witchcraft who have already lost their ways.

For this ritual, you will have to collect hellish Nether Wart and ocean kelp along with buckets containing lava and water.

In ritual, at night, place down a table in the center, upon which you shall put a feather.

Make a flour circle, for protection and ensure you domesticate this beast, 4-meter radii long.

To properly domesticate the beast, have Lamashtu's Blessing upon you.

In front of the table, put down Pazuzu's figure.

Place onto the four corners in a 2-meter radii put down an altar, where you will put down the items in the following configuration:

Recite this tablet's incantation on Pazuzu, and you shall summon the mighty Anzu lion-bird, which breathes fire and water, which will fertilize land (once recharged with water) with Abzu's power.
ritual.baby.tablet.text:
Group AG.2
Sacrifice of a new-born for Lamashtu before Pazuzu.

This is an advanced ritual, for those adept in witchcraft who have already lost their ways.

For this ritual, capture a human or living child. You will need Pazuzu's Blessing at all times and you will  need an Infused Pazuzu's Amulet, covered in Group B6.2.

In ritual, at night, place down Pazuzu's figure at the center of the ritual.

Behind the figure, put down three altars, in which you will put a Bile Bottle in the middle and food in the sides.

At each corner in a 3-meter radii put down a candle.

Make a flour circle, for protection within this danger, 4-meter radii long.

After the following configuration has been done:

Kill the child, and after you recite the tablet's incantation onto Pazuzu's figure, you shall have Lamashtu's Blessing and control for until dawn.
ritual.lamassu.tablet.text:
Group 1.2
Lamassu before Samas.

Perform the ritual in daylight.

In a 3 meters long table, put above it the figure of Samas, then place down food offerings to Samas on each side.

In front of it, put down a ceramic altar with 24 units of raw cow beef.

In each side of the ceramic altar, put down Mirsu.

You shall have the following configuration.

Recite the incantation from this tablet onto Samas' figure, and Lamassu will protect you as long as his physical form is alive.
ritual.pazuzu.notnight: You must perform this ritual at night.
ritual.pazuzu.notday: You must perform this ritual during the day.
ritual.tooevil: You are too evil to do this ritual.
